answers.answer: Ask them to check your placenta and to see if it is still working properly for baby. The same thing happened to my sister and her little boy was measuring smaller than average when they measured him at 39 weeks.  He should have been closer to average when he was born at 40 weeks but because of the placenta not working properly anymore he wasn't receiving enough nutrients which made him smaller than he should have been.

The same happened to me with my daughter I was 38 weeks however she was only measuring 32. At first they tried saying I had the due date wrong but turned out I had preeclampsia. So I would have to say ask your doctor to check for protein in your urine. Also keep in mind you might just be one to carry a small baby as long as it's healthy you will both be ok. Good luck.
My son was induced at 38 wks and he was 5p11oz but my pappA was low my whole pregnancy and this is the reason he was small also he had heart defects which could have contributed to him being tiny.

question: Im 39 weeks & my dr said my baby is small . Can someone tell me some reasons why that would be ? Please ?
title: help!
